LOGIN.TITLE: Login
LOGIN.SAFE_PREVIOUS: In order to login to the safe space, please login to the regular workspace first
LOGIN.NO_ACCESS: No permissions to access this area

LOGIN_APP.SERVERLIST_INFO: Choose the server you like to connect with.
LOGIN_APP.SERVERURL_INFO: Enter the URL of the server you like to connect to.
LOGIN_APP.SERVERURL_NOHTTPS: HTTP instead of HTTPS is not secure.
